metric.name: Function Executions Completed
metric.description: Total number of completed function.execute() calls for given function

metric.name: Function Executions Completed Processing Time
metric.description: Total time consumed for all completed invocations of the given function

metric.name: Function Executions Running
metric.description: Number of currently running invocations of the given function

metric.name: Results Sent To Result Collector
metric.description: Total number of results sent to the ResultCollector

metric.name: Results Received
metric.description: Total number of results received and passed to the ResultCollector

metric.name: Function Executions Has Result Completed Processing Time
metric.description: Total time consumed for all completed given function.execute() calls where hasResult() returns true.

metric.name: Function Executions Has Result Running
metric.description: A gauge indicating the number of currently active execute() calls for functions where hasResult() returns true.

metric.name: Function Executions Exceptions
metric.description: Total number of Exceptions Occured while executing function

metric.name: Function Execution Calls
metric.description: Total number of FunctionService.execute() calls for given function
